resources.string: Preuzimanje neuspješno. Dotaknite za ponovni pokušaj.
Vi trenutno imate sve lokacijske servise za ovaj uređaj ili aplikaciju isključene. Molim vas uključite ih u postavkama.
Za točnu navigaciju omogućite Preciznu lokaciju u postavkama.
Besplatno za sve, napravljeno sa ljubavi
• Nema reklama, nema praćenja, nema prikupljanja podataka
• Nema pražnjenja baterije, radi izvan mreže
Otvorenog koda aplikacija napravljena od entuzijasta i volontera.
Aplikacija zahtijeva hardverski ubrzani OpenGL. Nažalost, vaš uređaj nije podržan.
Isključite USB kabel ili umetnite memorijsku karticu kako biste koristili Organic Maps
Prvo oslobodite prostor na SD kartici/USB memoriji kako biste mogli koristiti aplikaciju
Prije što počnete koristiti aplikaciju, molim vas preuzmite svijetsku preglednu kartu na vaš uređaj.\nIskoristit če %s od memorije.
Select the folder to download maps to.
This can take several minutes.\nPlease wait…
Organic Maps zabilješke su s tobom dijeljene

Zdravo! 
 
U privitku su moje zabilješke; otvori ih u aplikaciji Organic Maps. Ako nije instalirana, možeš je preuzeti ovdje: https://omaps.app/get?kmz 
 
Uživaj u putovanju s Organic Maps!
Zabilješke su uspješno učitane! Možeš ih pronaći na karti ili na ekranu „Upravljač zabilješki”.
Neuspjelo učitavanje zabilješki. Datoteka je možda oštećena ili neispravna.
Your location hasn\'t been determined yet
Sorry, Map Storage settings are currently disabled.
Map download is in progress now.
Check out my current location in Organic Maps! %1$s or %2$s Don\'t have offline maps? Download here: https://omaps.app/get
Hej, pogledaj moj marker u Organic Maps!
Hey, check out my current location on the Organic Maps map!

Hi,

I'm here now: %1$s. Click this link %2$s or this one %3$s to see the place on the map.

Thanks.
Stvarno se želiš odjaviti sa svog OpenStreetMap računa?
Noćni stil pri navigaciji u mraku
3D zgrade su deaktivirane u modusu štednje energije
When enabled, the name of the street or exit to turn onto will be spoken aloud.
Testiraj glasovne upute (TTS, pretvaranje teksta u govor)
Provjeri glasnoću ili postavke sustava za pretvaranje teksta u govor ako sada ne čuješ glas.
Improve arrow direction by moving the phone in a figure-eight motion to calibrate the compass.
Move the phone in a figure-eight motion to calibrate the compass and fix the arrow direction on the map.
Long-tap on the map again to see the interface
To delete map, please stop navigation.
Routes can only be created that are fully contained within a map of a single region.
Quickly determine your approximate location using Bluetooth, WiFi, or mobile network
Download all of the maps along your route
In order to create a route, we need to download and update all the maps from your location to your destination.
Poklonite besplatne karte bez oglasa milijunima korisnika!
Report or fix incorrect map data
The email client has not been set up. Please configure it or contact us at %s
Prilikom praćenja rute, imajte sljedeće na umu:
– Uvjeti na cesti, prometni propisi i prometni znakovi uvijek imaju prednost pred navigacijskim savjetima;
– Karta može biti netočna, a predložena ruta možda nije uvijek najoptimalniji način za dolazak do odredišta;
– Predložene rute treba shvatiti samo kao preporuke;
– Budite oprezni s rutama u pograničnim zonama: rute koje je kreirala naša aplikacija ponekad mogu prelaziti državne granice na nedozvoljenim mjestima.
Budite oprezni i sigurni na cestama!
Unable to create route. Current GPS coordinates could not be identified.
Please check your GPS signal. Enabling Wi-Fi will improve your location accuracy.
Unable to locate current GPS coordinates. Enable location services to calculate route.
Please adjust your starting point or destination.
Route was not created. Unable to locate starting point.
Please select a starting point closer to a road.
Route was not created. Unable to locate the destination.
Please select a destination point located closer to a road.
Unable to locate the intermediate point.
Unable to create route due to an application error.
Would you like to download the map and create a more optimal route spanning more than one map?
Download additional maps to create a better route that crosses the boundaries of this map.
Download or update all maps along the projected path to calculate a route.
To start searching and creating routes, please download the map. After that you will no longer need an Internet connection.
Preuzmi regiju u kojoj tražiš ili pokušavaš dodati ime obližnjeg grada/sela.
Navigation is only available from your current location.
Do you want to plan a route from your current location?
Detaljno opiši problem kako bi ga OpenStreetMap zajednica mogla riješiti.
All of your map edits will be deleted with the map.
To create a route, you need to update all maps and then plan the route again.
Please make sure your device is connected to the Internet.
Drag the map to place the cross at the location of the place or business.
As it is written in the local language
No object can be located here
Community-created OpenStreetMap data as of %s. Learn more about how to edit and update the map at OpenStreetMap.org

OpenStreetMap.org (OSM) is a community project to build a free and open map. It\'s the main source of map data in Organic Maps and works similar to Wikipedia. You can add or edit places and they become available to millions of users all over the World.\nJoin the community and help to make a better map for everyone!
Create an OpenStreetMap account or log in to publish your map edits to the world.
Download over a cellular network connection?
This could be considerably expensive with some plans or if roaming.
The number of floors must non exceed %d
Describe errors on the map or things that cannot be edited with Organic Maps
Your edits are uploaded to the public OpenStreetMap database. Please do not add personal or copyrighted information.

Organic Maps omogućuje dodavanje samo jednostavnih kategorija točaka, znači bez navođenja gradova, cesta, jezera, obrisa zgrada itd. Dodajte takve kategorije izravno na OpenStreetMap.org. Pogledajte naš vodič za detaljne upute.
Download maps to search and navigate offline.
Please indicate the reason for deleting the place
Enter a valid Facebook web address, account, or page name
Enter a valid Instagram username or web address
Enter a valid Twitter username or web address
Enter a valid VK username or web address
Enter a valid LINE ID or web address
Or, alternatively, leave a note to OpenStreetMap community so that someone else can add or fix a place here.
Note will be sent to OpenStreetMap
Do you want to send it to all users?
Make sure you did not enter any private or personal data.
OpenStreetMap editors will check the changes and contact you if they have any questions.
Use mobile internet to show detailed information?
Mobile internet is required for map update notifications and uploading edits.
To display traffic data, maps must be updated.
We use system TTS for voice instructions. Many Android devices use Google TTS, you can download or update it from Google Play

For some languages, you will need to install a speech synthesizer or an additional language pack from the app store (Google Play, Galaxy Store, App Gallery, FDroid).\nOpen your device\'s settings → Language and input → Speech → Text to speech output.\nHere you can manage settings for speech synthesis (for example, download language pack for offline use) and select another text-to-speech engine.
For more information please check this guide.
Use search, select a bookmark, or tap on the map to add a route starting point
Use search, select a bookmark, or tap on the map to add a destination point
Please login to OpenStreetMap to automatically upload all your map edits. Learn more here.
External storage is not accessible. The SD card may have been removed, damaged, or the file system is read-only. Please, check your SD card or contact us at support\@organicmaps.app
Nije moguće dijeliti zbog greške aplikacije
Prazan popis se ne može dijeliti

plurals.name: bookmarks_detect_message
plurals.item: Pronađeno je %d datoteka. Možeš ih vidjeti nakon konverzije.
Pronađena je %d datoteka. Možeš je vidjeti nakon konverzije.
Pronađene su %d datoteke. Možeš ih vidjeti nakon konverzije.
Pronađeno je %d datoteka. Možeš ih vidjeti nakon konverzije.

resources.string: Za dodavanje zabilješke dodirni mjesto na karti, a zatim dodirni ikonu zvjezdice
Pokušaj smanjiti potrošnju energije na štetu nekih funkcionalnosti.
Ako ima previše zabilješki, prikazivanje njihovih imena na karti može usporiti aplikaciju.
Enable this option temporarily to record and manually send detailed diagnostic logs about your issue to us using \"Report a bug\" in the Help dialog. Logs may include location info.
A route could not be found. This may be caused by your routing options or incomplete OpenStreetMap data. Please change your routing options and retry.
Opcije za određivanje rute su aktivirane
Download and update all map along the projected path to calculate route.
You’ve changed the world map! Don\'t keep it to yourself; tell your friends and edit it together.
Add new places to the map, and edit existing ones directly from the app.
To download, you need more space. Please delete any unnecessary data.
I improved the Organic Maps maps
Your suggested map changes will be sent to the OpenStreetMap community. Please describe any additional details that cannot be edited in Organic Maps.
An error occurred while determining your location. Check that your device is working properly and try again later.
Enable access to geolocation in the device settings
Or continue using Organic Maps without Location
Your note will be sent to OpenStreetMap
Disable recording of your recently travelled route?
Organic Maps uses your location in the background to record your recently travelled route.
To display traffic data, the application must be updated.
Please login to OpenStreetMap to automatically upload all your map edits. Learn more
An error occurred while loading tags, please try again
Do you want to rebuild the route?
Keyboard is not available while driving
Unable to build a route from your current location
Unable to find a route to your destination. Please choose another end point
No GPS signal. Please move to an open area
Unable to build a route. Please specify other route points
To create a route, download missing maps on your device
An error occurred. Please restart the application
The route will be rebuilt from your current location
The route will be converted into an automobile one
Prijeđi na mobitel za prikaz svih zabilješki
Please download maps in the app on your mobile device
Subway navigation in this region is not available yet
Please choose a start or end point closer to a subway station
Aktiviranje izohipsa zahtijeva preuzimanje podataka karte za ovo područje
Izohipse još nisu dostupne za ovo područje
Uvećaj prikaz karte za prikaz izohipsa
Nije moguće stvoriti mapu i premjestiti datoteke na internu memoriju uređaja ili SD karticu
When enabled, the screen will always be on when displaying the map.
When enabled, the app will work on the lockscreen even when the device is locked.
Hvala što koristiš karte koje je izradila naša zajednica!
With your donations and support, we can create the best maps in the World!
Do you like our app? Please donate to support the development! Don\'t like it yet? Please let us know why, and we will fix it!
If you know a software developer, you can ask him or her to implement a feature that you need.
Tap anywhere on the map to select anything. A long tap is used to hide and show the interface.
Did you know that your current location on the map can be selected?
You can help to translate our app into your language.
Our app is developed by a few enthusiasts and the community.
You can easily fix and improve the map data.
Our main goal is to build fast, privacy-focused, easy-to-use maps that you will love.
Sada koristiš Organic Maps na ekranu telefona
Sada koristiš Organic Maps na ekranu auta
Organic Maps treba pristup lokacijama. Kada je sigurno, provjeri obavijest na telefonu.
Za učinkovit rad Organic Maps treba dozvole za lokacije u aplikaciji Android Auto
Speech Synthesis settings were not found, are you sure your device supports it?
For the most accurate navigation, we recommend disabling power saving mode in phone\'s battery settings.
Track is empty - nothing to save
Unable to display folder selection dialog because no suitable app is installed on your device. Please install a file manager app and try again.
No app installed that can open the location
Updating maps keeps the information about objects up to date
Are you sure you want to delete this track?
Would you like to send a bug report to the developers?\nWe rely on our users as Organic Maps doesn\'t collect any error information automatically. Thank you in advance for supporting Organic Maps!
Sinkronizacija iClouda je eksperimentalna funkcija u razvoju. Spremi sigurnosnu kopiju svih svojih zabilješki i puteva.
Please enable iCloud in your device\'s settings to use this feature.
Error: Failed to synchronize due to connection error
Error: Failed to synchronize due to iCloud quota exceeded
You need to update the %s map to the latest version before you can contribute to the OpenStreetMap data
Za prikaz ruta, karte moraju biti ažurirane.
Detecting location in the background is necessary to fully enjoy the functionality of the app. It is used for navigation and saving your recently traveled track.
Determining your location is necessary for navigation and for saving your recently traveled track.
